reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Providing emergency shelter food for the affected people in the Republic of Djibouti.

description.narrative: Distributing relief aid (shelter and food) to the groups most affected by the floods in the Republic of Djibouti. 1- Filling the need for food and shelter for those affected by the floods to rehabilitate their buildings. 2. Standing by the side of the Djiboutian people during the crises and natural disasters that their country is exposed to.
Securing materials (shelter and food) from the center's warehouses and transporting them by air to Djibouti. And distribution to those affected by the floods in each of (Ali Subaih, Dakhil, Arta).

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
